content: this pattern includes an 8 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes sizes child teen/adult adult larger heads any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used scheepjes stone washed xl #4 medium yarn 75 meter/82 yards per skein color a 861 pink quartzite color b 849 yellow jasper color c 862 brown agate crochet hook size 5 mm scissors yarn needle pom pom notes in this pattern made as child teen/adult adult larger heads in this picture i have demonstrated with teen/adult size gauge blocked 10 single_crochet x 7 row of single_crochet st = 2 for the brim 7 5 cluster st x 6 row of cluster st = 4 for the body of the hat measurements child = 16 circumference stretches out to 19 x 7 33 tall teen/adult = 18 28 circumference stretches out to 21 28 x 8 tall adult larger heads = 20 57 circumference stretches out to 23 57 x 8 tall thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
